author: LORI HINNANT and FOSTER KLUG
title: Hunt for medical gear to fight virus becomes all-consuming
description: The hunt for ventilators and other medical supplies is consuming the U.S. and Europe, as new virus infections soar
content:
PARIS -- 
The hunt for masks, ventilators and other medical supplies consumed the U.S. and Europe on Monday, as new coronavirus infections soared and political paralysis stalled efforts for a quick aid package from Congress.
